title: Calories in Pizza Hut Breadsticks
meta_description: Discover calories in breadsticks pizza hut for a standard 2-stick serving, including carbs, protein, fat, sodium details, and easy tweaks for your order.
assumptions: Standard Pizza Hut Italian breadsticks, baked fresh, no dipping sauce or toppings included; based on official nutrition info.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, recipe changes, portion size, and add-ons like sauce. Check Pizza Hut's app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: Two Pizza Hut breadsticks provide about 280 kcal, mostly from carbs with some fat and protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with Pizza Hut's labeling.

tweaks.label: Add marinara dipping sauce (1 oz shared for 2 sticks)

faqs.q: How many calories in one Pizza Hut breadstick?
What are the carbs in breadsticks pizza hut?
faqs.a: Two breadsticks have 42 g carbs, mainly from refined flour.

faqs.q: Are Pizza Hut breadsticks high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, two sticks contain 620 mg sodiumâ€”watch if on a low-salt diet.

faqs.q: Calories in Pizza Hut breadsticks with cheese?
faqs.a: Adding cheese increases to about 190 kcal per stick.

faqs.q: How does preparation affect calories in breadsticks pizza hut?
faqs.a: Baked as standard; fried or extra butter versions add 20-50 kcal per stick.
